concept.title: REST Response
concept.shortdesc: You can view the REST response that the console uses to generate displays. The REST response is JSON data that you can send to a StreamSets client services member to help troubleshoot issues.

p.draft-comment: access point, different types. move the following into a subheading?

conbody.p:
You can view the following types of REST responses:
Pipeline Configuration - Provides information about the pipeline and each stage in the pipeline.
Pipeline Rules - Provides information about metric and data rules and alerts.
Definitions - Provides information about all available stages.
Pipeline Preview - Provides information about the preview data moving through the pipeline. Also includes monitoring information that is not used in preview.
Pipeline Monitoring - Provides monitoring information for the pipeline.
Pipeline Status - Provides the current status of the pipeline.
JVM Metrics - Provides JVM metrics for the .

Different REST responses are available at different locations in the console. The following table lists the types of JSON data that you can generate:
Data Collector Console location REST Response
Pipeline Configuration Pipeline Configuration
Pipeline Rules
Definitions
Data Preview Pipeline Preview
Pipeline Monitoring Pipeline Monitoring
Pipeline Status
Pipeline Configuration
Pipeline Rules
Definitions
Viewing JVM Metrics JVM Metrics
